review: We had issues with this, buffering and telling us to check out connection. After talking with some other family members about the issues, we learned that the "extension" that comes with the stick is what we needed. The stick was completely hidden from sight behind the TV, but when we plugged the extension in the wireless connection was able to read the stick. We haven't had a problem since. We love it and have watched all kinds of movies and TV series we missed. Highly recommend this if you're tired of running out to rental places all the time.
